item.title: FFT
item.description: .center { margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: table; width: auto; } 模版 FFT const int maxn = (1<<22) + 5; // 注意这里需要是 > 2^k struct Complex { double x,y; Complex(double _x = 0.0, double _y = 0.0) { x = _x; y = _y; } Complex operator+(const Complex& b) const { return Complex(x + b.x, y + b.y); } Complex operator-(const Complex& b)
